description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Works of Robert Burns; containing his life; by John Lockhart, Esq. The poetry and correspondence of Dr. Currie's edition; biographical sketches of the poet by himself, Gilbert Burns, Professor Stewart, and others; Essay on Scottish Poetry, including the poetry of Burns, by Dr. Currie ... select Scottish songs of the other poets ... with Burns's remarks, etc", "Works" Author: Burns, Robert Contributor: CURRIE, James - M.D Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11611.ee.22." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: New-York Date of Publishing: 1835 Publisher: 13. William Pearson Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000543169 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
